about.title: Multimedia Artist
about.aboutText: I am Jimf Bocales, a passionate multimedia editor and creative designer delivering high-impact visuals that captivate audiences . With expertise in Adobe Photoshop, Premiere Pro, After Effects, Audacity, CapCut, and Canva, I specialize in video editing, photo enhancement, logo animation, and brand design. From social media reels, YouTube content, and cinematic wedding videos to product photo editing, book covers, and motion graphics, I help brands and creators transform ideas into visually stunning stories that engage, inspire, and sell.

pitch: With a strong foundation in multimedia, design, and technology, I approach every project with humility, a willingness to listen, and the confidence to deliver results. If youâ€™re looking for someone who values collaboration, clear communication, and quality work, I would be honored to be part of your journey.
